# Generic Checklists (Template)

## Docs (VitePress)

- RED: wrong base; dead links; asset case/path; search missing
- GREEN: dev+build pass; key pages reachable; no dead links; correct paths
- REFACTOR: i18n/large sidebars/diagram conflicts

## Slides (Slidev)

- RED: theme/fonts not applied; blank/misaligned export; inconsistent highlight
- GREEN: present/export ok; consistent theme; media compliance
- REFACTOR: compatibility/export remedies; asset size optimisation
